issue.title: [Python] Extend compute kernel type testing to cover kernels which take recordbatch / table input
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13955](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13955). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-13952 introduced testing for the various computer kernel signatures.  Some compute kernels (e.g. drop_nulls) have special handling for RecordBatch & Table.  These are not covered by the first pass of type testing.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13955?focusedCommentId=17565542) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
